trans-unit.source: Elasticsearch failovers are independent of PostgreSQL failovers; however, since the Chef Infra Server can only talk to a single Elasticsearch instance, if Elasticsearch fails on the leader node, Leaderl will failover (including a PostgreSQL failover) to another node.
trans-unit.target: Elasticsearch的故障转移与PostgreSQL的故障转移无关;但是,由于Chef Infra Server只能与单个Elasticsearch实例对话,如果Elasticsearch在Leader节点上发生故障,Leaderl将故障转移(包括PostgreSQL的故障转移)到另一个节点。

trans-unit.source: Elasticsearch manages its own availability. 1 of the 3 nodes can have a service-level Elasticsearch failure without affecting the availability of the cluster.
trans-unit.target: Elasticsearch管理自己的可用性。3个节点中的1个节点可以发生服务级Elasticsearch故障,而不影响集群的可用性。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the disk using a customer-supplied encryption key. After you encrypt a disk with a customer-supplied key, you must provide the same key if you use the disk later (e.g. to create a disk snapshot or an image, or to attach the disk to a virtual machine). Customer-supplied encryption keys do not protect access to metadata of the disk. If you do not provide an encryption key when creating the disk, then the disk will be encrypted using an automatically generated key and you do not need to provide a key to use the disk later.
trans-unit.target: 使用客户提供的加密密钥对磁盘进行加密。使用客户提供的密钥加密磁盘后,如果以后使用磁盘(例如,创建磁盘快照或映像,或将磁盘附加到虚拟机),必须提供相同的密钥。客户提供的加密密钥不能保护对磁盘元数据的访问。如果您在创建磁盘时没有提供加密密钥,那么磁盘将使用自动生成的密钥进行加密,以后使用磁盘时无需提供密钥。

trans-unit.source: Endpoint configuration attributes. Every endpoint has a set of API supported attributes that can be used to control different aspects of the message delivery. The currently supported attribute is x-goog-version, which you can use to change the format of the pushed message. This attribute indicates the version of the data expected by the endpoint. This controls the shape of the pushed message (i.e., its fields and metadata). The endpoint version is based on the version of the Pub/Sub API. If not present during the subscriptions.create call, it will default to the version of the API used to make such call. If not present during a subscriptions.modifyPushConfig call, its value will not be changed. subscriptions.get calls will always return a valid version, even if the subscription was created without this attribute. The possible values for this attribute are: - v1beta1: uses the push format defined in the v1beta1 Pub/Sub API. - v1 or v1beta2: uses the push format defined in the v1 Pub/Sub API.
trans-unit.target: 端点配置属性。每个端点都有一组API支持的属性,可以用来控制消息传递的不同方面。目前支持的属性是x-goog-version,你可以用它来改变推送消息的格式。这个属性表示端点所期望的数据版本。这控制了推送消息的形状(即其字段和元数据)。端点的版本是基于Pub/Sub API的版本。如果在 subscriptions.create 调用期间不存在,它将默认为用于进行此类调用的 API 的版本。如果在 subscriptions.modifyPushConfig 调用期间不存在,它的值将不会被更改。 subscriptions.get 调用将始终返回有效的版本,即使订阅是在没有此属性的情况下创建的。这个属性的可能值是-v1beta1:使用v1beta1 Pub/Sub API中定义的推送格式。-v1或v1beta2:使用在v1 Pub/Sub API中定义的推送格式。

trans-unit.source: Entirely remove a cookbook (or cookbook version) from the Chef server. Use this action carefully because only one copy of any single file is stored on the Chef server. trans-unit.source: Environment attributes can be set to either default attribute level or an override attribute level.
trans-unit.target: 可以将环境属性设置为 default 属性级别或 override 属性级别。

trans-unit.source: Environment attributes that are used with roles can be overridden. Typically, this is done by using attribute precedence, but sometimes it may be necessary to ensure that specific attributes are used based on the presence of specific environments. This type of scenario is best addressed in using a recipe that relies on a top-level key that is stored in a data bag.
trans-unit.target: 与角色一起使用的环境属性可以被覆盖。通常情况下,这是通过使用属性优先来完成的,但有时可能需要确保根据特定环境的存在来使用特定属性。这种类型的情况最好在使用依赖于存储在数据袋中的顶层密钥的配方中解决。

trans-unit.source: Erchef is a complete rewrite of the core API for the Chef Infra Server, which allows it to be faster and more scalable than previous versions. The API itself is still compatible with the original Ruby-based Chef Infra Server, which means that cookbooks and recipes that were authored for the Ruby-based Chef Infra Server will continue to work on the Erlang-based Chef Infra Server. Chef Infra Client is still written in Ruby.
trans-unit.target: Erchef是对Chef Infra Server的核心API的完全重写,这使得它比以前的版本更快,扩展性更强。API本身仍然与原来基于Ruby的Chef Infra Server兼容,这意味着为基于Ruby的Chef Infra Server编写的烹饪书和食谱将继续在基于Erlang的Chef Infra Server上工作。Chef Infra Client仍然是用Ruby编写的。

The chef-client is still written in Ruby.

trans-unit.source: Especially with plugins, it can be desirable to re-evaluate inputs every time and not cache them. By default, an existing input value is reused which can lead to problems if the retrieved values are expected to change. An example for this is using kitchen-inspec with input plugins to connect to a Vault server for password retrieval.

trans-unit.source: Etcd
trans-unit.target: Etcd

trans-unit.source: Etcd is used by Leaderl to elect a PostgreSQL leader and store status and cluster state information. Its availability is required for Leaderl to continue functioning properly. 1 of the 3 nodes can have service-level etcd failures and the cluster should remain available. If the Etcd failure is on the current leader, a PostgreSQL failover will occur.
trans-unit.target: Etcd被Leaderl用来选举PostgreSQL的领导者并存储状态和集群状态信息。它的可用性是Leaderl继续正常运行的必要条件。3个节点中可以有1个节点发生服务级的Etcd故障,集群应该保持可用。如果Etcd故障在当前Leader上,则会发生PostgreSQL故障转移。

trans-unit.source: Even though the defaults assume a high-latency environment, cloud deployments should be restricted to the same datacenter, or in AWS, in the same region. This means that geographically-dispersed cluster deployments are not supported. Multiple Availability Zones are supported as long as they are in the same region.
trans-unit.target: 即使默认设置假定为高延迟环境，也应将云部署限制在同一数据中心或在同一区域的AWS中。这意味着不支持地理位置分散的群集部署。多个可用性区域的，只要是在同一地区的支持。

trans-unit.source: Even though this is a very simple example, the full capabilities of Ruby can be used to tackle even the most complex and demanding template requirements.
trans-unit.target: 尽管这是一个非常简单的例子,但Ruby的全部功能可以用来处理最复杂和苛刻的模板需求。

trans-unit.source: Even when trusted, self-signed certificates only work when the certificate subject is the same as the host running the service. For example, if the certificate subject is an IP address such as 10.10.10.10, but the GitHub Enterprise server is reachable at github.example.com, the URL https://github.example.com will fail SSL certificate validation while the URL https://10.10.10.10 will pass.
trans-unit.target: 即使在受信任的情况下，自签名证书也仅在证书主题与运行服务的主机相同时起作用。例如，如果证书主题是IP地址（例如 10.10.10.10 )，但GitHub Enterprise服务器可通过github.example.com访问，则URL https://github.example.com 将失败SSL证书验证，而URL https://10.10.10.10 将通过。

trans-unit.source: Eventually the hosts will quiesce and report ds:UpToDate/UpToDate. Depending on how long the secondary was down, how much data was written to the primary in the interim, and the speed of the shared network, this process could be nearly instantaneous, or could take several minutes. The processes used to manage the Chef server should not require manipulation in any way during this recovery.
trans-unit.target: 最终，主持人将停顿并报告 ds:UpToDate/UpToDate 。根据辅助节点停机的时间，过渡期间向主节点写入的数据量以及共享网络的速度，此过程可能几乎是瞬时的，也可能需要几分钟。在此恢复过程中，用于管理Chef服务器的进程无需进行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Every 3.1 seconds, pop a member off the list, and send it a “PING” message.
trans-unit.target: 每隔3.1秒，从列表中弹出一个成员，并向其发送“ PING”消息。

trans-unit.source: Every 4 hours, the data-feed-service will aggregate the client runs and compliance reports from the previous 4 hours and send this information to the registered destinations. This time interval is 4 hours by default, but is configurable
trans-unit.target: 每隔4小时,数据反馈服务将汇总前4小时的客户端运行和合规性报告,并将此信息发送到注册目的地。该时间间隔默认为4小时,但可以配置。

trans-unit.source: Every AWS account has at least one VPC, the “default” VPC, in every region.
trans-unit.target: 每个AWS账户在每个区域中至少有一个VPC，即“默认” VPC。

trans-unit.source: Every Chef Habitat artifact belongs to an origin and is cryptographically signed with that origin’s private key. Chef Habitat requires the private key for producing artifacts and requires the public key for verification of artifacts before installation. If it is present on Builder, Chef Habitat will automatically download the public key for an origin when necessary.
trans-unit.target: 每个Chef Habitat工件都属于一个来源，并使用该来源的私钥进行加密签名。 Chef Habitat需要用于生成工件的专用密钥，并需要用于在安装之前验证工件的公用密钥。如果Builder上有公钥，则“人居主厨”将在必要时自动下载原始公钥。

trans-unit.source: Every Chef Infra Server organization must have at least one environment. Each organization starts out with a single _default environment. The _default environment cannot be modified in any way. Nodes, roles, run-lists, cookbooks (and cookbook versions), and attributes specific to an organization can only be associated with a custom environment. Additional environments can be created to reflect each organization’s patterns and workflow. For example, creating production, staging, testing, and development environments.
trans-unit.target: 每个Chef Infra Server组织必须至少具有一个环境。每个组织都从一个 _default 环境开始。该 _default 环境不能以任何方式修改。特定于组织的节点，角色，运行列表，食谱（以及食谱版本）和属性只能与自定义环境相关联。可以创建其他环境以反映每个组织的模式和工作流程。例如，创建 production ， staging ， testing 和 development 环境。

trans-unit.source: Every cookbook requires a small amount of metadata. A file named metadata.rb is located at the top of every cookbook directory structure. The contents of the metadata.rb file provides hints to the Chef server to help ensure that cookbooks are deployed to each node correctly.
trans-unit.target: 每本烹饪书都需要少量的元数据。一个名为metadata.rb的文件位于每个cookbook目录结构的顶部。metadata.rb文件的内容为Chef服务器提供提示,以帮助确保cookbook正确地部署到每个节点。

trans-unit.source: Every cookbook requires a small amount of metadata. A file named metadata.rb is located at the top of every cookbook directory structure. The contents of the metadata.rb file provides information that helps Chef Infra Client and Server correctly deploy cookbooks to each node.
trans-unit.target: 每本烹饪书都需要少量的元数据。一个名为metadata.rb的文件位于每个cookbook目录结构的顶部。metadata.rb文件的内容提供了帮助Chef Infra Client和Server正确部署cookbook到每个节点的信息。

trans-unit.source: Every node that will be configured by Chef Infra Client and every workstation that will upload data to the Chef Infra Server must be able to communicate with the hosted Chef server
trans-unit.target: 每一个将由Chef Infra Client配置的节点和每一个将数据上传到Chef Infra服务器的工作站必须能够与托管的Chef服务器进行通信。

trans-unit.source: Every peer that receives this rumor does a simple lexicographic comparison of its GUID with the GUID of the peer contained in that rumor. The winner is the peer whose GUID is higher. The peer then adds a vote for the GUID of the winner, and shares the rumor with others, including the total number of votes of anyone who previously voted for this winner.
trans-unit.target: 每一个收到这个谣言的对等体都会对自己的GUID和该谣言中包含的对等体的GUID进行简单的词法比较。胜利者是GUID较高的对等体。然后,该对等体为获胜者的GUID添加一票,并与其他人分享该谣言,包括之前为该获胜者投票的任何人的总票数。

trans-unit.source: Every request made by Chef Infra Client to the Chef Infra Server must be an authenticated request using the Chef Infra Server API and a private key. When Chef Infra Client makes a request to the Chef Infra Server, Chef Infra Client authenticates each request using a private key located in /etc/chef/client.pem.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client对Chef Infra Server的每个请求都必须是使用Chef Infra Server API和私钥进行的经过身份验证的请求。当Chef Infra Client向Chef Infra Server发出请求时，Chef Infra Client使用位于 /etc/chef/client.pem 中的私钥对每个请求进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Every request made by the chef-client to the Chef server must be an authenticated request using the Chef server API and a private key. When the chef-client makes a request to the Chef server, the chef-client authenticates each request using a private key located in /etc/chef/client.pem.
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端对Chef服务器的每个请求都必须是使用Chef服务器API和私钥进行的经过身份验证的请求。当厨师客户端向厨师服务器发出请求时，厨师客户端使用位于以下位置的私钥对每个请求进行身份验证 /etc/chef/client.pem 中。

trans-unit.source: Every resource has its own set of actions and properties. Most properties have default values. Some properties are available to all resources, for example those used to send notifications to other resources and guards that help ensure that some resources are idempotent.
trans-unit.target: 每个资源都有自己的动作和属性集。大多数属性都有默认值。有些属性对所有资源都是可用的,例如那些用于向其他资源发送通知的属性,以及有助于确保某些资源为幂等资源的守卫。

trans-unit.source: Every second, take 5 members from the list.
trans-unit.target: 每隔一秒,从名单中抽取5名成员。

trans-unit.source: Every time the scan job is scheduled to run, we will query the provider for a current list of nodes, so we always have the most current list. These are the instances we will run the scan job against. If a query (limiting the set of items to scan) was included during job creation, we will also respect that query against the most current list of instances.
trans-unit.target: 每次扫描作业被安排运行时,我们将查询提供商的当前节点列表,因此我们总是有最新的列表。这些是我们将针对扫描作业运行的实例。如果在创建作业期间包含了一个查询(限制要扫描的项目集),我们也将尊重该查询,针对最新的实例列表。

trans-unit.source: Every time this period passes, generate a new CryptoKeyVersion and set it as the primary. The first rotation will take place after the specified period. The rotation period has the format of a decimal number with up to 9 fractional digits, followed by the letter s (seconds). It must be greater than a day (ie, 86400).
trans-unit.target: 每当这段时间过去时，生成一个新的CryptoKeyVersion并将其设置为主。第一次旋转将在指定时间段后进行。轮换周期的格式为十进制数字，最多9个小数位，后跟字母 s （秒）。它必须大于一天（即86400）。

trans-unit.source: Everyone with origin membership can see the Settings tab, but only origin administrators and owners can add, update, or delete settings content.
trans-unit.target: 具有原始成员身份的每个人都可以看到“设置”选项卡，但是只有原始管理员和所有者可以添加，更新或删除设置内容。

trans-unit.source: Everyone with origin membership can view origin secrets, but only origin administrators and owners can add, update, or delete settings. Origin Secrets are located at the bottom of the Settings tab (Builder > Origin > Settings > Origin Secrets) and they let you encrypt and store secrets as environment variables. Origin secrets are useful for plans that require access to protected resources at build time, such as private source-code repositories and cloud storage providers.
trans-unit.target: 具有原始成员身份的每个人都可以查看原始秘密，但是只有原始管理员和所有者可以添加，更新或删除设置。Origin Secrets位于“设置”选项卡的底部（“构建器”>“ Origin”>“ Settings”>“ Origin Secrets”），它们使您可以加密和存储秘密作为环境变量。对于需要在构建时访问受保护资源的计划（例如私有源代码存储库和云存储提供者），原始秘密很有用。

trans-unit.source: Examines the list of statements contained in the policy and passes if at least one of the statements matches. This matcher does not interpret the policy in a request authorization context, as AWS does when a request processed. Rather, have_statement examines the literal contents of the IAM policy, and reports on what is present (or absent, when used with should_not).
trans-unit.target: 检查策略中包含的语句列表，如果至少一个语句匹配，则通过。这种匹配并不能解释的请求授权范围内的政策，当一个请求处理为AWS一样。相反， have_statement 会检查IAM策略的文字内容，并报告存在的内容（与 should_not 一起使用时不存在的内容）。

trans-unit.source: Exception and report handlers are made available to a Chef Infra Client run in one of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 异常和报告处理程序以下列方式之一提供给Chef Infra客户端运行。

trans-unit.source: Exception and report handlers are made available to the chef-client run in one of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 异常和报告处理程序以下列方式之一提供给厨师客户端运行。

trans-unit.source: Exception and report handlers are used to trigger certain behaviors in response to specific situations, typically identified during a Chef Infra Client run.
trans-unit.target: 异常和报告处理程序用于触发某些行为,以响应特定的情况,通常在Chef Infra Client运行期间确定。

trans-unit.source: Exception and report handlers are used to trigger certain behaviors in response to specific situations, typically identified during a chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 异常和报告处理程序用于在特定情况下触发某些行为,通常是在厨师客户端运行期间确定的。

trans-unit.source: Exception and report handlers can be distributed using the chef_handler cookbook. This cookbook is authored and maintained by Chef and exposes a custom resource that can be used to enable custom handlers from within recipes and to include product-specific handlers from cookbooks. The chef_handler cookbook can be accessed here: https://github.com/chef-cookbooks/chef_handler. See the README.md for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用chef_handler食谱来分发异常和报告处理程序。这本食谱是由Chef编写和维护的，它公开了一个自定义资源，该资源可用于在食谱中启用自定义处理程序，并包括该食谱中针对特定产品的处理程序。该chef_handler食谱可以在这里访问：https://github.com/chef-cookbooks/chef_handler。有关更多信息，请参见 README.md 。

trans-unit.source: Executing hab sup run will start a Supervisor process in the foreground. If this is the first time a Supervisor has been run on the system, nothing else will happen; the process will be waiting for the user to “load” services into it. However, if this is not the first time the Supervisor has been run, any previously loaded services that were not “stopped” (i.e., told not to run) will be started up as well.
trans-unit.target: 执行 hab sup run 将在前台启动Supervisor进程。如果这是第一次在系统上运行Supervisor，则将不会发生其他任何事情。该过程将等待用户将服务“加载”到其中。但是，如果这不是Supervisor的第一次运行，那么任何先前未“停止”（即被告知不要运行）的已加载服务也将被启动。

trans-unit.source: Existing documentation for pushing a change through Chef Automate is applicable for AWS OpsWorks for Chef Automate. The only extra configuration that you will need to do is to make sure you edit the security group of your AWS OpsWorks for Chef Automate instance to allow inbound Git traffic (using the SSH protocol). This is required so that you can create and approve changes in your Chef Automate instance. Once you find your Chef Automate instance you can go to the linked security group and add a new inbound rule.
trans-unit.target: 现有用于通过Chef Automate进行更改的文档适用于适用于Chef Automate的AWS OpsWorks。您唯一需要做的额外配置是确保您编辑AWS OpsWorks for Chef Automate实例的安全组，以允许入站Git通信（使用SSH协议）。这是必需的，以便您可以在Chef Automate实例中创建和批准更改。一旦你找到你的厨师自动化的实例，你可以去到链接安全组，并添加新的入站规则。

trans-unit.source: Expanded lists of roles (all of the roles that apply to a node, including nested roles) and recipes to the role and recipe attributes on a node are saved on the Chef Infra Server. The expanded lists of roles allows for searching within nodes that run a given recipe, even if that recipe is included by a role.

trans-unit.source: FIPS (Federal Information Processing Standards)
trans-unit.target: FIPS(联邦信息处理标准)

trans-unit.source: FIPS 140-2 is a specific federal government security standard used to approve cryptographic modules. Chef Automate uses the OpenSSL FIPS Object Module, which satisfies the requirements of software cryptographic modules under the FIPS 140-2 standard. The OpenSSL Object Module provides an API for invoking FIPS approved cryptographic functions from calling applications.
trans-unit.target: FIPS 140-2是一个特定的联邦政府安全标准,用于批准加密模块。Chef Automate 使用 OpenSSL FIPS Object Module,它满足 FIPS 140-2 标准下软件加密模块的要求。OpenSSL对象模块提供了一个API,用于从调用应用程序中调用FIPS批准的加密功能。

trans-unit.source: Failures happen, so completely preventing a split-brain event is not an absolute possibility. However, it is possible to alleviate some of the issues that crop up in any split-brain event scenarios by maxing out the heartbeat network bandwidth and optimizing transfer protocols.
trans-unit.target: 会发生故障，因此绝对不可能完全防止发生 split-brain 事件。但是，可以通过最大化心跳网络带宽并优化传输协议来缓解在任何 split-brain 事件场景中出现的一些问题。

trans-unit.target: 当前可用的功能： tools ， fieri ， announcement ， github 和 no_crawl 。

trans-unit.source: Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) are federal standards for computer systems used by contractors of government agencies and non-military government agencies.
trans-unit.target: 联邦信息处理标准(FIPS)是政府机构承包商和非军事政府机构使用的计算机系统的联邦标准。

trans-unit.source: Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) is a United States government computer security standard that specifies security requirements for cryptography. The current version of the standard is FIPS 140-2. Chef Infra Client can be configured to allow OpenSSL to enforce FIPS-validated security during a Chef Infra Client run. This will disable cryptography that is explicitly disallowed in FIPS-validated software, including certain ciphers and hashing algorithms. Any attempt to use any disallowed cryptography will cause Chef Infra Client to throw an exception during a Chef Infra Client run.
trans-unit.target: 联邦信息处理标准(FIPS)是美国政府的计算机安全标准,规定了密码学的安全要求。该标准的当前版本是FIPS 140-2。Chef Infra Client可以配置为允许OpenSSL在Chef Infra Client运行期间执行FIPS验证的安全。这将禁用FIPS验证软件中明确不允许的加密技术,包括某些密码和散列算法。任何试图使用任何不允许的加密技术都会导致Chef Infra Client在Chef Infra Client运行期间抛出一个异常。

trans-unit.source: Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) is a United States government computer security standard that specifies security requirements for cryptography. The current version of the standard is FIPS 140-2. The chef-client can be configured to allow OpenSSL to enforce FIPS-validated security during a chef-client run. This will disable cryptography that is explicitly disallowed in FIPS-validated software, including certain ciphers and hashing algorithms. Any attempt to use any disallowed cryptography will cause the chef-client to throw an exception during a chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 联邦信息处理标准(FIPS)是美国政府的计算机安全标准,规定了密码学的安全要求。该标准的当前版本是FIPS 140-2。chef-client可以被配置为允许OpenSSL在chef-client运行过程中执行FIPS验证的安全。这将禁用在FIPS验证软件中明确不允许的加密技术,包括某些密码和哈希算法。任何试图使用任何不允许的加密技术都会导致厨师客户端在厨师客户端运行期间抛出一个异常。

trans-unit.source: File location: <plan>/hooks/file-updated. This hook is run whenever a configuration file that is not related to a user or about the state of the service instances is updated.
trans-unit.target: 文件位置： <plan>/hooks/file-updated 。每当更新与用户或服务实例状态无关的配置文件时，都会运行此挂钩。

trans-unit.source: File location: <plan>/hooks/init. This hook is run when a Chef Habitat topology starts.
trans-unit.target: 文件位置： <plan>/hooks/init 。当厨师栖息地拓扑开始时，将运行此挂钩。

trans-unit.source: File location: <plan>/hooks/install. This hook is run when a package is initially installed.
trans-unit.target: 文件位置： <plan>/hooks/install 。最初安装软件包时运行此挂钩。

trans-unit.source: File location: <plan>/hooks/post-run. The post run hook will get executed after initial startup. For many data services creation of specific users / roles or datastores is required. This needs to happen once the service has already started.
trans-unit.target: 文件位置： <plan>/hooks/post-run 。初始启动后，将运行后运行挂钩。对于许多数据服务，需要创建特定的用户/角色或数据存储。服务启动后，就需要执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: File location: <plan>/hooks/post-stop. The post-stop hook will get executed after service has been stopped successfully. You may use this hook to undo what the init hook has done.
trans-unit.target: 文件位置： <plan>/hooks/post-stop 。成功停止服务后，将执行停止后挂钩。您可以使用此钩子来撤消 init 钩子所做的事情。

trans-unit.source: File location: <plan>/hooks/reconfigure. A reconfigure hook can be written for services that can respond to changes in <plan>/config without requiring a restart. This hook will execute instead of the default behavior of restarting the process. {{pkg.svc_pid_file}} can be used to get the PID of the service.
trans-unit.target: 文件位置： <plan>/hooks/reconfigure 。甲 reconfigure 钩可为可在变化作出响应的服务被写入 <plan>/config ，而不需要重新启动。该挂钩将执行，而不是重新启动进程的默认行为。 {{pkg.svc_pid_file}} 可用于获取服务的 PID 。

trans-unit.source: File location: <plan>/hooks/reload. This hook is now deprecated; you should use reconfigure instead (see below). To provide backward compatibility, if a reload hook is provided, the service will restart in response to configuration changes.
trans-unit.target: 文件位置： <plan>/hooks/reload 。现在不建议使用此钩子；您应该改用 reconfigure （请参见下文）。为了提供向后兼容性，如果提供了 reload 挂钩，则该服务将响应配置更改而重新启动。

trans-unit.source: File location: <plan>/hooks/run. This hook is run when one of the following conditions occur:
trans-unit.target: 文件位置： <plan>/hooks/run 。发生以下情况之一时，将运行此挂接：

trans-unit.source: File location: <plan>/hooks/suitability. The suitability hook allows a service to report a priority by which it should be elected leader. The hook is called when a new election is triggered and the last line it outputs to stdout should be a number parsable as a u64. In the event that a leader goes down and an election is started the service with the highest reported suitability will become the new leader.
trans-unit.target: 文件位置： <plan>/hooks/suitability 。适应性挂钩允许服务报告应被选为领导者的优先级。触发新选举时，将调用该钩子，并且该钩子输出到 stdout 的最后一行应为可解析为 u64 的数字。如果领导者垮台并开始选举，则报道的适用性最高的服务将成为新领导者。

trans-unit.source: Files can be encrypted for the service group they are intended for. To do so, pass the --user option with the name of your user key, and the --org option with the organization of the service group. If you have the public key for the service group, the data will be encrypted for that key, signed with your user key, and sent to the ring.
trans-unit.target: 可以针对目标服务组对文件进行加密。为此，请将 --user 选项与用户密钥的名称一起传递，并将 --org 选项与服务组的组织一起传递。如果您具有服务组的公共密钥，则将对该密钥进行数据加密，并用您的用户密钥签名，然后发送到环网。

trans-unit.source: Foodcritic CLI
trans-unit.target: Foodcritic CLI

trans-unit.source: Foodcritic Linting
trans-unit.target: 严格控制食品起毛

trans-unit.source: Foodcritic is a static linting tool that analyzes all of the Ruby code that is authored in a cookbook against a number of rules, and then returns a list of violations. Because Foodcritic is a static linting tool, using it is fast. The code in a cookbook is read, broken down, and then compared to Foodcritic rules. The code is not run (a Chef Infra Client run does not occur). Foodcritic does not validate the intention of a recipe, rather it evaluates the structure of the code, and helps enforce specific behavior, detect portability of recipes, identify potential run-time failures, and spot common anti-patterns.
trans-unit.target: Foodcritic是一种静态整理工具，可以根据许多规则分析食谱中编写的所有Ruby代码，然后返回违规列表。因为Foodcritic是静态的掉毛工具，所以使用起来很快。读取，分解食谱中的代码，然后将其与Foodcritic规则进行比较。该代码未运行（Chef Infra Client运行不会发生）。 Foodcritic不会验证配方的意图，而是评估代码的结构，并帮助实施特定行为，检测配方的可移植性，识别潜在的运行时故障以及发现常见的反模式。

trans-unit.source: Foodcritic is deprecated and should no longer be used for cookbook linting. Use Cookstyle instead which offers additional rules, violation autocorrection, Ruby linting, and a robust configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 食品评论家已弃用，不应再用于菜皮棉绒。使用Cookstyle代替，它提供其他规则，违规自动更正，Ruby linting和可靠的配置系统。

trans-unit.source: Foodcritic is run from the command line, typically against a single cookbook and all of the Ruby files contained within it:
trans-unit.target: Foodcritic是从命令行运行的,通常是针对一本食谱和其中包含的所有Ruby文件。

trans-unit.source: Foodcritic looks for lint-like behavior and reports it!
trans-unit.target: Foodcritic寻找类似绒毛的行为,并报告它!

trans-unit.source: For not_if and only_if attribute, why-run mode will assume these are commands or blocks that are safe to run. These conditions are not designed to be used to change the state of the system, but rather to help facilitate idempotency for the resource itself. That said, it may be possible that these attributes are being used in a way that modifies the system state
trans-unit.target: 对于 not_if 和 only_if 属性，为什么运行模式将假定这些是可以安全运行的命令或块。这些条件并非旨在用于更改系统状态，而是有助于促进资源本身的幂等性。也就是说，这些属性可能以修改系统状态的方式使用

trans-unit.source: For Chef Infra Client, two important aspects of nodes are groups of attributes and run-lists. An attribute is a specific piece of data about the node, such as a network interface, a file system, the number of clients a service running on a node is capable of accepting, and so on. A run-list is an ordered list of recipes and/or roles that are run in an exact order. The node object consists of the run-list and node attributes, which is a JSON file that is stored on the Chef Infra Server. Chef Infra Client gets a copy of the node object from the Chef Infra Server during each Chef Infra Client run and places an updated copy on the Chef Infra Server at the end of each Chef Infra Client run.
trans-unit.target: 对于Chef Infra Client来说,节点的两个重要方面是属性组和运行列表。属性是关于节点的特定数据,如网络接口、文件系统、节点上运行的服务能够接受的客户数量等。运行列表是一个有序的配方和/或角色的列表,这些配方和/或角色是按照准确的顺序运行的。节点对象由运行列表和节点属性组成,它是一个JSON文件,存储在Chef Infra服务器上。Chef Infra Client在每次Chef Infra Client运行期间从Chef Infra Server获取节点对象的副本,并在每次Chef Infra Client运行结束时将更新的副本放在Chef Infra Server上。
